app.name: CherryFest
app.long_description:
Ceris' Automatic Splatfest Installer
This REQUIRES Mocha CFW to be active before launching. Using Haxchi sigpatches will cause your device to freeze. This app will install the latest splatfest from my website, splatfest.cherrymint.live!
I am not responsible for any damage that may occur, though none should.
